summary: Tested Notification Engine for ForgeVoice Studio. All 10 backend API tests passed. Frontend notification bell, panel, and mark-as-read functionality verified working.
passed_tests: GET /api/notifications - Returns list of notifications with correct structure
POST /api/notifications/read-all - Marks all notifications as read
Notification created on submission status change
Notification types are valid enum values (SUBMISSION, STATUS_CHANGE, DEADLINE, SYSTEM, FVS_IDEA)
Notification priorities are valid enum values (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH)
Notification items display with priority border styling
Mark all as read button works (when unread notifications exist)
critical_code_review_comments: Notification model properly uses Pydantic with enum types for type and priority
MongoDB _id excluded correctly in all notification queries
Notification creation on status change wrapped in try/catch to not fail main operation
Frontend uses proper data-testid attributes for all interactive elements
NotificationPanel correctly uses isOpen prop for conditional rendering
seed_data_creation: Notifications created via submission status changes during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Notification Engine fully implemented and tested. Backend endpoints working correctly. Frontend NotificationPanel uses 'aura-glass' class for glass-morphic styling. Notifications are automatically created when submission status changes. All notifications were marked as read during testing.
